Posts.Content: had my third session of chemo nearly two weeks ago. They gave me steroid tablets for three days , plus a file of steroid liquid intervenously. Now my tummy is emormous its swollen to the point i look nine months pregnant . I feel bloated and uncomfortable now. Before ii had lost a stone and a half butt over two weeks have gained back six pound in weight this last two weeks . Has anyone else had this or a simular problem.
Posts.Title: swollen tummy
